title: Blubrake ABS G2 cuts bike antilock brake size & weight in half!
content:
When Blubrake ABS debuted a bike anti-lock braking system, the size, weight & internal mounting solution mostly limited its use to bigger cargo bikes & bulky e-bikes. But now with the second generation, their ABS G2 is less than 1/2 the size, almost 1/2 the weight, and there’s a new fork mount option that simplifies […]
